description:
MD3140 Core Clinical Practice aims to provide a solid foundation for the management of core medical problems, and equip students with necessary knowledge, skills, and behaviour to commence training as an effective junior doctor
within Singapore’s health care system upon graduation. There will be five postings: Medicine, Family Medicine, Paediatrics, Surgery, and Orthopaedic Surgery where students will be integrated within the health care teams in the
teaching hospitals.
title: Core Clinical Practice
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
